kill-containers: docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq)
kill-remove-containers: docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker rmi -f $(docker images -q)
do-it: echo 'Images are started. Lets give the environment some time to boot up. Care for a coffee?'
install-wp-test: docker-compose run --rm wp-cli wp scaffold theme-tests wordpress-shuttle --force
docker-compose -f docker-compose.phpunit.yml run --rm wordpress_phpunit /app/bin/install-wp-tests.sh wordpress_test root '' mysql_phpunit latest true
